name: Woof
description:
Woof woof!

Arrow keys to move, enter key to interact, as with most RPG Maker games.

Please let me know if the file works and if you know how to make RPG Maker games work in-browser.

Made in two days, for LocusJam. Don't expect anything intricate. It's just a fun little thing.

There is a way to end the game. (I mean, other than the esc menu)
